course_title: Chem Mentors:  Leadership in Peer-Led Learning
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 35 / Seats Avail: 10Waitlist Total: 0
course_description:
This purpose of this course is to train those students who have been selected by the Department of Chemistry to serve as Chem Mentors for Chem 141/142. 
The course is by permission only. Note that this course may not be used to satisfy elective credit for the chemistry major.
prerequisites: (CHEM 141 or CHEM_OX 141 or CHEM 150 or CHEM_OX 150) and (CHEM 142 or CHEM_OX 142 or CHEM 202 or CHEM_OX 202) or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1895, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 1-2p, Instructor: T. McGill, Status: Open
